attributes.action: Stop the pandemic panic and trust the vaccine
attributes.additional_details: I have had my vaccine, I want my freedom back and I am sick of scientific advisors dictating to me.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Ensure that ALL Covid restrictions are lifted on June 21st 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584862

After the vaccine roll-out to high risk groups, remove ALL covid-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564347
